name: Strapi
description: Use the Strapi CMS to manage your content.
aiDescription: Strapi is a headless CMS that lets non-developers manage content through an admin UI while developers consume it via REST or GraphQL APIs. Unlike WordPress, Strapi is 'headless'â€”it only provides the content API, you build your own frontend with Solid. Key features: customizable content types builder, role-based access control, media library, internationalization (i18n), and a plugin ecosystem. Choose Strapi when you have content that needs to be edited by non-developers (blogs, marketing pages, product catalogs), want to decouple content management from code deployments, or need a CMS that's more developer-friendly than WordPress. The integration sets up a Strapi client for fetching content.
